channel.title: Wardens of the Amber Cage on Gembasher Studio

item.title: Alpha Build 2
item.description: A new build correcting some nasty bugs is available on the download page !

item.title: Downloads
item.description: Wardens of the Amber Cage Alpha Here is the current free public prototype. It support both Virtual Reality and standard screen modes.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Gembasher Studio is a French video game studio based on Toulouse focusing on Virtual Reality games. We are currently working on our first public project : Wardens of the Amber Cage. Gembasher Studio Design/Developement Marc Debout Gaël Fenet-Garde Clément Lebrun Sound Design Guillaume Garroustet Modeling/Animation Manuel Milhau Additionals Assets Music Dan Farley Models/Textures Bitgem Mana Station Busina Particles FX Kenneth «Archanor» Foldal Moe Animations Explosive

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Table of contents General Multiplayer Virtual Reality Contact Us General What input devices are supported? Wardens of the Amber Cage is designed to be played in virtual reality with a gamepad. Default setup works with Xbox 360 gamepad. You aim with your head orientation. You will need some time to aim correctly if you have no prior experience. If you play on a flat screen you can either use a mouse and a keyboard or a gamepad.

item.title: Guide Wardens of the Amber Cage
item.description: Table of Contents First Use Guide Combat Guide User Inputs Guide Multiplayer Game Guide First Use We advise you to read these instructions before you first playing session as the game currently lack in-game tutorial : Launch the game. Virtual Reality Only Setup : If you want to play with a Virtual Reality headset, you must setup the game options. Check the field ‘Play in VR Mode’ to switch on Virtual Reality display mode.

item.title: Website opening
item.description: We are proud to open this website and begin the public presentation of our project. We hope you to be as enthousiast as us :).
